communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Acknowledge setbacks, celebrate small steps, avoid preaching.

narratives.c_essay: I'm on a journey to leave behind harmful communities and help others do the same. As a history buff and animal lover, I find solace in the past and comfort in working with animals. Despite the challenges of my parents' divorce and planning my wedding, I'm committed to recovery and mutual support. I share resources and celebrate every small step forward, always encouraging others.
narratives.p_intro: Hi, I'm recovery_0026_1eb2be! I'm here to support you on your recovery journey. We'll acknowledge setbacks together and celebrate every small victory. Let's share resources and keep moving forward, one step at a time. I love history and animals, and I'm engaged to be married soon!
